original_text: Now John was clothed with camel's hair and wore a leather belt around his waist and ate locusts and wild honey.
korean_text: 요한은 낙타털 옷을 입고 허리에 가죽 띠를 띠고 메뚜기와 석청을 먹더라

sentences.original_text: Now John was clothed with camel's hair
and wore a leather belt around his waist
and ate locusts and wild honey
